src:
Huawei Indonesia Buka Registrasi Preorder Mate 30 Pro
02 Nov 2019, 14:30 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Foto: Dok. Huawei

Jakarta - Dalam waktu dekat Mate 30 Pro akan segera hadir di Indonesia. Huawei pun buka pendaftaran bagi mereka yang ingin memiliki ponsel tersebut.Program bertajuk Registration of Interest (ROI) itu dilihat mulai 2 November ini hingga 14 November nanti. Pendaftaran bisa dilakukan lewat link di sini.Setelah registrasi, masa pre-order akan diadakan mulai 15 hingga 22 November 2019. Huawei akan memilik konsumen yang telah mendaftar di ROI untuk dapat melakukan pre-order serta mendapatkan sejumlah benefit.Konsumen dijanjikan akan mendapatkan tambahan satu tahun layanan jaminan, yang termasuk layanan 24 jam dan asuransi layar selama 3 bulan. Dan dalam masa pre-order, konsumen juga akan mendapatkan Huawei Freelace serta casing ponsel.


Foto: Dok. Huawei

Untuk diketahui Mate 30 Pro mengusung layar 6,53 inch yang punya resolusi 2400x1080 pixel dan menggunakan teknologi bernama 'Horizon Display' yang layarnya melengkung pada bagian kanan dan kirinya.Mate 30 Pro mempunyai empat kamera, yaitu SuperSensing Camera, Cine Camera, kamera dengan lensa tele, dan kamera 3D Depth Sensing. Untuk dapur pacunya, ponsel ini ditenagai chipset Kirin 990 dan GPU Mali G76.Dibekali abterai berkapasiytas 4.500 mAh dengan pengisian cepat 40W. Mate 30 Pro dilengkapi sensor pendeteksi gestur gerakan tangan, yang bisa dipakai untuk mengontrol ponsel, seperti mengambil screenshot atau melakukan scrolling. "Huawei Mate 30 Pro adalah untuk mereka yang special yang menghargai teknologi, yang menginspirasi dan terinspirasi oleh inovasi, dan yang siap untuk menghadapi hal-hal di luar kemungkinan," kata Lo Khing Seng, Deputy Country Director, Huawei Consumer Business Group dalam keterangan resminya. Simak Video "Huawei Akui Tak Kena Dampak Signifikan Kebijakan AS soal Boikot China"[Gambas:Video 20detik](afr/afr)
text:
Huawei Indonesia Open Preorder Mate 30 Pro Registration
02 Nov 2019, 14:30 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Photo: Doc. Huawei

Jakarta - In the near future Mate 30 Pro will be coming soon in Indonesia. Huawei also opened registration for those who want to have a cellphone. The program titled Registration of Interest (ROI) was seen from 2 November until 14 November. Registration can be done via the link here. After registration, the pre-order period will be held from 15 to 22 November 2019. Huawei will have customers who have registered at ROI to be able to pre-order and get a number of benefits. Consumers are promised to get an additional one year of warranty service, which includes 24-hour service and screen insurance for 3 months. And in the pre-order period, consumers will also get a Huawei Freelace and cellphone casing.


Photo: Doc. Huawei

To note Mate 30 Pro carries a 6.53 inch screen that has a resolution of 2400x1080 pixels and uses a technology called 'Horizon Display' whose screen is curved on the right and left side. Mate 30 Pro has four cameras, namely SuperSensing Camera, Cine Camera, camera with lens telephones, and 3D Depth Sensing cameras. For the pacunya kitchen, this phone is powered by Kirin 990 chipset and Mali G76 GPU. It is equipped with a capacity of 4,500 mAh with fast charging of 40W. Mate 30 Pro is equipped with a hand gesture detection sensor, which can be used to control cellphones, such as taking screenshots or scrolling. "Huawei Mate 30 Pro is for those who are special who value technology, who inspire and are inspired by innovation, and who are ready to face things that are out of the question," said Lo Khing Seng, Deputy Country Director, Huawei Consumer Business Group in its official statement .
